snippet.title: Live Coding: Documentation w/ ReadTheDocs.org (RTFD)
snippet.description:
Readthedocs.org allows for free hosting for documentation. You can have the documentation automatically generated from plain-text into HTML and PDF documents available on a public host. Let's take one of our existing projects, and improve the documentation so it's better than a little README. We'll create the documentation in our GitHub repo and then have Readthedocs automatically generate HTML and PDF docs any time we commit!

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85 
Buy my book: Security with Go https://www.packtpub.com/networking-and-servers/security-go
Website: https://www.devdungeon.com
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/DevDungeon
Download Streamlabs OBS and start streaming yourself for free: https://streamlabs.com/slobs/d/13836773
Opening music:  Song: Buzzsaw (feat. Zircon), Big Giant Circles & zircon, Imposter Nostalgia
